website_summaries.verdict: Best value for laminate floors that aren't seen often by guests.
pros: Saves more expensive cleaners for highly visible rooms
A great deal for floors that no one sees very often
Reviewers swear it works better than vinegar/water solution on laminate floors
cons: Some say there isn't a citrus smell despite the fact that the bottle suggests there is

customer_reviews.title: Best Spray/swipe and go!
customer_reviews.text: This is about the best “spray and go” to give those wood floors a shiny nice glow! Lol That rhymes! I have only found 1other product better, and the company quit producing it. I’ve had wood floors and or Pergo style floors for 35 years. Spray it right on floor & apply using a dust mop. Gets rid of those foot prints and paw prints for a nice shine as you look across your room. I get the large refill size to save a lil $
customer_reviews.author: leann martin

customer_reviews.title: Cleans better than Bona!
customer_reviews.text: Can't find it in stores,? Love it, cleans better than Bona
customer_reviews.author: Brooksie

customer_reviews.title: Use this if you have Armstrong hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well, and is the recommended cleaner for use with Armstrong wood and laminate floors. The reason you want to use this instead of some other cleaners is that this is an alcohol based cleaner. Water based cleaners leave behind water that can get into the crevices between hardwood planks and eventually cause problems; alcohol from alcohol based cleaners evaporates. Additionally, if you have an issue with your floor at some point, this cleaner will not nullify your warranty, like some other hardwood cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best hardwood floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my dad!!! I have not been happy with results from cleaning with Bona or the Shaw Floor Cleaner...both recommended by the Company that put my floors in 10 years ago. This cleaner awesome!!! No streaking noticed after cleaning. We I'll definitely be the only hardwood cleaner I'll use on my floors. Before and after pictures inclued.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality, quantity & nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my hardwood floors. Hard to find. Good price for quantity. Little problem receiving as stated would receive. However, Amazon was fast to correct problem. Thank you Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not use anything but this on my hardwood laminate floors. It works so well and does not streak at all. I highly recommend this cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a slight film after it dries. If I ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a slight film after it dries. If I walk a towel across the floor after, it removes the film...

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well. Laminate floor is high gloss so other products seemed to leave streaks which drove me crazy. This cleaner did not appear to leave streaks and left a shinier finish ( with three cats, a dog, and the winter snow that did not last long).

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought another floor cleaner that I was very disappointed in. When I used your product my floors ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got my laminate floors put in I bought another floor cleaner that I was very disappointed in. When I used your product my floors looked great.

customer_reviews.title: Love this floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Love this floor cleaner. Leaves floor free of cleaning solutions to attack dirt and oils from shoes, dries quickly, and makes floors look great.

customer_reviews.text: First product I've used that doesn't leave a film on my dark hardwood laminate.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so much better than other products I've use for laminated floors.

customer_reviews.title: This product works fantastic on wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This product works fantastic on wood floors. No streaks and a nice shine. However, it was expensive on Amazon. I happened to stumble upon it at Menards for a fraction of the price on here.

customer_reviews.title: It cleans great. Leaves a great shine
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I buy for my hardwood and laminate floors. It cleans great. Leaves a great shine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: It works great and smells good on our wood floor.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well with no left behind residue and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used it for years. Cleans well with no left behind residue and is easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: I've used Armstrong floor cleaner before and love that it doesn't leave a filmy residue
customer_reviews.text: I don't have hardwood, but laminent wood floors. I've used Armstrong floor cleaner before and love that it doesn't leave a filmy residue. Thought I'd try the hardwood cleaner and it really cleans and shines my laminent wood floors without a filmy residue. Dries fast too.

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great when you first clean the floor
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great when you first clean the floor, but once you start walking on it it starts looking smudged and streaked. Not happy with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: marion m.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping Pergo laminate floors clean and virtually streakfree.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several different floor cleaners on our Armstrong Pergo laminate flooring and we found this product to be the best for cleaning while leaving little to no streaks behind. We bought one of the spray type mops with the bottle you can fill with your choice of product and micro -fiber cleaning pad. The spray feature seems to help by distributing an even, fine mist of the product while the micro-fiber pad picks dirt up quickly and seems to help with providing the streak free shine also.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiGrace

customer_reviews.title: No streak wood floor cleaner: REALLY
customer_reviews.text: We discovered this cleaner did not leave any streaks on our hardwood floors. I highly recommend this cleaner to anyone with hardwood floors. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Pat Schilling

customer_reviews.title: This really works.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product (under a different name) for 25 years when we got our Hartco wood flooring and we were advised to use this product. It’s the best. I’ve never used anything else and my floors look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Helps to preserve wood and composite floors while giving them a nice sheen.

customer_reviews.title: Working great.

customer_reviews.title: I spray this on my hardwood and then mop with the mop.

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best laminate floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Best product available for laminate flooring. I have tried many other types and brands of laminate floor cleaner and this is the best of the best. Highly recommend this procuct.

customer_reviews.title: No build up.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning business and have been using this for years. No build up, does not take much and smells clean.

customer_reviews.text: Cleans and shines. Never sticky like some cleaners. Have been using for about 10 years.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I am worried this might be counterfeit because it is blue and smells like windex instead of the orange scent in the description. I would hate to use this on my beautiful hardwood floors and this product destroy the finish. It is not eligible for return so beware when you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan buffington

product_meta.title: Hardwood and Laminate Floor Cleaner Ready To Use Refill Citrus Fusion 64oz (64 Oz)
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:2Armstrong Hardwood And Laminate Floor Cleaner Citrus Fusion Ready To Use Refill 64 ounce (oz). This economical cleaner is a cost-effective way to keep your no-wax, urethane coated hardwood and laminate floors looking their absolute best. Offers a refreshing Citrus Fusion scent and is designed for all-in-one cleaning in three steps. Simply sweep, spray and mop floors for a streak and residue free clean every time. May be used to refill your 32 ounce spray bottle or an empty spray bottle for regular or spot-cleaning of your residential/commercial hardwood and laminate flooring.
feature_bullets: Ready-to-use formula no need to dilute
